Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of faded lotus flower in added white outline with added red centre; exterior: band of very short vertical strokes between lines at rim; below, part of face and neck of possible sphinx, to left; pendant roundel and rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 257, no. 468, pl. 63)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0511) (phase 2)
